title: UnderWorldSettings
description: Configuration for running the UnderworldGodot project.

pathuw1.description: Folder location of the Underworld 1 game files.

pathuw2.description: Folder location of the Underworld 2 game files.

gametoload.description: Which of the two games to load.

level.description: The game level to load. (0-8 in UW1, 0-71 in UW2)

lightlevel.description: Set the lighting level of the dungeon. Value is ignored.

shader.description: Default shader used. Value is ignored. (was previously used to allow for selection of different shaders during experimentation of palette effects)

showcolliders.description: Enables displaying of collision meshes and colliders in game

shaderbandsize.description: Controls how many light shades are calculated in between the vanilla shades.dat colour palette values to smooth light shading. (no of interpolated colours between the vanilla colours)
